title: Blue essence conversions when preseason comes...
body:
Hi,

I am just wondering about blue essence and IP conversions when the preseason rolls around. 

I know (as explained in the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yq2i6RDmbNc) 

that any current IP you have right now will be turned exactly into blue essence at a 1:1 ratio. So therefore if I were to have 25867 IP, I would have 25867 of the new Blue Essence when preseason comes. 

However what exactly will happen to current (old) Blue Essence?

I have heard it will become also  - at a 1:1 ratio - the new Blue Essence. However i have also heard of a 1:6.5 ratio, a 1:6.8 and a 1:17.5. So if i had 1 blue essence I have 1 blue essence in the new season, and if I had 2 blue essence I would have 13 in the new season.

If it is possible could a riot employee clear this up? Or someone who knows for sure...

Thank you! :D

replies.body: Not sure about these ratios.  :o  Your Blue Essence you have now will remain the same and simply merge with the converted IP.  If that changes, though, we'll continue to announce those updates at our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) site.

>**What will happen to my existing blue essence?**
>
>To ensure your existing blue essence is not losing value during the transition to the newer, bluer essence, it will be multiplied by 6.5 and added to your IP balance to calculate your total blue essence value.


Source: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908
